revised_title: Obituary of Alexander Russell: A Pioneering Electrotechnics Expert
tldr: The obituary celebrates the life and work of Dr. Alexander Russell, a renowned expert in electrotechnics. Russell made significant contributions to the field, including his role as a successful principal at Faraday House and his numerous publications. He was also known for his kindness and modesty, as well as his dedication to helping students throughout his career.
